string-array.name: ABOUT
string-array.item: The River Club brings an exciting new dimension to Corks thriving restaurant and bar.
We are a traditional Irish pub, famous for an atmosphere built on live music and dance
Fitzgerald Park or Fitzgerald Park is a public park in Cork city and the location of the Cork Public Museum

Blarney Castle is a tower house, a type of fortification built by Gaelic lords and the Anglo-Irish between the 15th and 17th centuries.
